quickchart.app_readme:
quickchart

quickchart is a chart designed to let user deploy a docker image in a TrueNAS SCALE kubernetes cluster. It provides a mechanism to specify workload type, add external host interfaces in the pods, configure volumes and allocate host resources to the workload.
quickchart.description: A Helm chart for deploying simple workloads Kubernetes
quickchart.name: quickchart
quickchart.title: quickchart
